The freelance design solution for Barcelona

Hi, my name is Lukasz Adam and I am a Barcelona based Freelance Web Designer, who provides affordable web design solutions to other freelancers, agencies, entrepreneurs or for your personal projects.

I do web development, User Interface Design & SEO Marketing. My Web Design services extend throughout the Barcelona area (including Girona, Tarragona, Montserrat, Santa Susana, Sitges, Vilanova i la Geltr√∫).

Since I am a Freelancer, I very often meet my lovely customers in Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera, because it is not so crowded like Barcelona‚Äôs touristic parts -la rambla-, especially in the summer months. However I am also able to work remotely from all parts of the world.

Inspiring Freelance Web Design

Inspired by Barcelonas beautiful nature like the Llobregat and the Bes√≤s river, my goal is to provide Antoni Gaudis Hometown with individualised solutions for web design, web development, wordpress customisation & search engine optimization (on-page as well as off-page seo).

Whether it be for an individual like an entrepreneur, a personal trainer, or a famous blogger. My Web Design Services


I currently work with clients of several types of businesses: large-corporations, home-based business like bloggers, digital normads, local shops, artists, photographers, developers, stores and restaurants.

I provide web solutions for 2023 and every website that I code or that I design the User Interface for, is made responsive, which means you can check it on your smartphone without any problems.

I love to provide the whole area of barcelona with modern & excellent service & web design solutions.

Including:


  • User Interface Design (Websites, Apps, Mobile Responsive Pages)
  • Web Development (HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, Angular.JS)
  • WordPress Solutions (Custom Made Plugins, adding functions, securing your data)
  • Web Hosting Help (With a GitHub Account and a static website you can host your page without monthly costs!)
  • SEO Marketing (On-Page SEO, Off-Page SEO, Content Marketing, Internal Linking, Title & Tag Adjustment, Skyscraper Content)
  • Responsive Webdesign Making your Page perfectly fitted for smartphones and tablets.
